General.Name: Lontrue Co Ltd
General.Description: Lontrue Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the agricultural and sideline product processing activities, and data center business in China and internationally. The company offers fresh fruits, nuts, seeds, dried fruits, pre-packaged products, and OEM products; and life cycle management services for the data center industry, including data center planning and design, engineering construction, operation and maintenance, cloud computing, and value-added services. Its primary products include apples, raisins, pine nuts, and pine nut kernels. The company serves food, IDC, and logistics industries. It is also involved in the exporting activities. The company was formerly known as Yantai Guangyuan Fruit Vegetable Co., Ltd and changed its name to Lontrue Co., Ltd. in May 2009. Lontrue Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Longkou, China.
